to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s ONE_PASSWORD_LOGIN_EGGHEAD -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s MAC_PASSWORD -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s ONE_PASSWORD_LOGIN_PERSONAL -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s BUSINESS_EMAIL -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s BUSINESS_EMAIL -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s PERSONAL_EMAIL -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '

osascript -e '

                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s SPAM_EMAIL -w"

osascript -e '

                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s USERNAME -w"

                           '

osascript -e '
                           set out to do shell script "security find-generic-password -a $USER -s USERNAME -w"
                           
                           tell application "System Events" to keystroke out
                           '
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 4" to run trigger "code" in workflow "com.vivaxy.workflow.open-in-vscode" with argument " "'
osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 4" to run trigger "code" in workflow "com.vivaxy.workflow.open-in-vscode" with argument " "'
